resources.string: "Welcome to ZipCloset the first ever NFC enabled application designed to facilitate shopping and closet organization "
Click Go to Closet to see a full Inventory of all the items in your closet.
Press Zip to open empty Clothing Information Page and Zip write an NFC Id to a tag
**As long as your NFC device is unlocked you can tag an NFC Clothing Tag!** i.e. on device home screen or anywhere in this app or anywhere in any app.
View a list of all the NFC Clothing Items you tagged
"List of all the Items you Tagged "
**Time,date, and more information on clothing coming soon**

This is your basic NFC Clothing Item Screen, Up top you will find basic information linked on a databse to that specific NFC Tag tha you tagged to get here. Below it are a pair of buttons to demonstrate a couple capabilities and an Image of the item is displayed
Shows a picture, the brand, and the price of each object in each section of your closet respectively
Shows a list of each favorite item when initially opened and uses the icons to the right to navigate through your closet.
